item.content:
SPECIFICATIONS

1. The dimension of the bot should not exceed 30cm x 30cm x 30cm. 2. The weight of the bot should not exceed 5 Kgs. (Excluding remote control and remote control wire.) 3. In case of a wireless bot weight will be counted as (0.8x actual weight). 4. Readymade gear boxes, parts, chassis, control circuits and remote control can be used.
